short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the alt-text for xkcd comics below the comic, for easy readability.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension puts the alt-text for xkcd comics in a little box below the comic itself, so that it is more easily readable, and doesn't fade away if the text is too long.
